abstract: Sony has a long and colorful history of failure on the Internet, but there has been a bright spot.
snippet: Sony has a long and colorful history of failure on the Internet, but there has been a bright spot.
lead_paragraph: Sony has a long and colorful history of failure on the Internet. But there has been a bright spot, one Sony operation — Sony Online Entertainment, based in San Diego — has built a legitimately innovative and successful Internet business.

headline.main: Sony’s Other Games Division Makes Push in New Direction
headline.print_headline: Sony’s Other Games Division Makes Push in New Direction

abstract: Several Internet companies, including Microsoft and eBay, are working on new ways to keep spammers from infiltrating their sites.
snippet: Several Internet companies, including Microsoft and eBay, are working on new ways to keep spammers from infiltrating their sites.
lead_paragraph: On the Internet, nobody knows you’re a human — until you fill out a captcha.

headline.main: A Dog or a Cat? New Tests to Fool Automated Spammers
headline.print_headline: A Dog or a Cat? New Tests to Fool Automated Spammers

abstract: General Electric’s NBC unit and Microsoft explored making a joint bid for Dow Jones but decided against it a week ago, a person close to NBC and Microsoft said.
snippet: General Electric’s NBC unit and Microsoft explored making a joint bid for Dow Jones but decided against it a week ago, a person close to NBC and Microsoft said.
lead_paragraph: General Electric’s NBC unit and Microsoft explored making a joint bid for Dow Jones but decided against it a week ago, a person close to NBC and Microsoft said yesterday.

headline.main: NBC Studied Dow Jones Bid With Microsoft
headline.print_headline: NBC Studied Dow Jones Bid With Microsoft

abstract: Nearly a decade after the government began its landmark effort to break up Microsoft, the Bush administration has sharply changed course by repeatedly defending the company both in the United States and abroad against accusations of anticompetitive conduct, including the recent rejection of a complaint by Google.
lead_paragraph: Nearly a decade after the government began its landmark effort to break up Microsoft, the Bush administration has sharply changed course by repeatedly defending the company both in the United States and abroad against accusations of anticompetitive conduct, including the recent rejection of a complaint by Google.

headline.main: Microsoft Finds Legal Defender in Justice Department

abstract: General Electric‘s NBC unit and Microsoft explored making a joint bid for Dow Jones but decided against it about a week ago, according to news reports Monday.
lead_paragraph: General Electric‘s NBC unit and Microsoft explored making a joint bid for Dow Jones but decided against it about a week ago, according to news reports Monday.

headline.main: NBC Studied Dow Jones Bid With Microsoft
